name: Cook Clicker
description:
Cook Clicker 🎮Game Introduction Guys, move your fingers, it’s time to get rich!

Cook Clicker is an idle game inspired by the most creative game in this world -  Cookie Clicker. In this game, you click the mouse to gain money, unlock new props, and make the restaurant get a higher rating. You also need to deal with nonsensical events that can happen anytime. But do not let them get in the way of your steps toward the restaurant tycoon!

❤️The emotion of the game:  Anticipation 🧑‍🍳Group Members

👨‍🍳Ruchuan Ji (Mechanic & Prop & Text Designer )

👩‍🍳Ruijie Chen (Game 2D Art & Sound Designer)

👨‍🍳Jingwei Wu (Mechanic & UI Designer )

👩‍🍳Yanyun Feng (Insane Programer)

👨‍🍳Yuhui Zhou (Super Programer)

👨‍🍳Zhijian Weng (Mega Programer)
